text: Soni naga asimene ni awala waakulupilile, akasatiji: “Tukulupilile (yanti Muhammadi ﷺ Ntume nsyesyene soni jukolanjidwe mu itabu yetu.)” Nambo pati atemi achimisyenepe pakasyepela akasatiji: “Ana nkwatagulila wanganyao yammanyisye Allah (mu Taurat) kuti akan'gomeche nayo kwa M'mbuje gwenu, ana wangali lunda?”
